AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: leviathan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born slightly different to most, even by child standards [PAWN_pronoun] struggled to walk, and was far more at home in the water. Turns out [PAWN_nameDef] was born a Leviathan, which became incredibly obvious as [PAWN_pronoun] grew larger, far larger than any child should be. Also [PAWN_possessive] jaw distending when eating may have helped [PAWN_possessive] parents come to that conclusion.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: avatar of Satakal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was born, it was apparent [PAWN_pronoun] was different. [PAWN_possessive] village believed [PAWN_pronoun] was an avatar of Satakal, and worshipped [PAWN_nameDef] as if [PAWN_pronoun] was a god. This was swiftly put to an end after Orgnum's Royal Guard visited [PAWN_possessive] village.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sea demon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was born, it was apparent [PAWN_pronoun] was different. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to escape from [PAWN_possessive] outpost when the Colovian armies began their attack. Forced to live in the wilds, [PAWN_nameDef] relied on pure animalistic instinct to survive. The inhabitants of nearby fishing villages thought [PAWN_pronoun] was a sea demon, and multiple times attempted to capture [PAWN_possessive].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: snakeskin child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Thanks to being born as a Leviathan, the Storm Sharks took great interest in [PAWN_nameDef]. They began 'training' [PAWN_objective] as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was able to walk. This took a great toll on [PAWN_nameDef], causing [PAWN_objective] to regress into an animalistic beast.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: abandoned child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born during an unfortunate time, [PAWN_nameDef] was quickly left to fend for [PAWN_objective]self. Luckily for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] was born as a Leviathan, and as such was fully capable of surviving the wilds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: serpent child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] heard a calling from the wilds one day, and decided to wander off in search of it. Completely lost, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually came across an ancient sea serpent, who took [PAWN_objective] in as if [PAWN_pronoun] were its own child. If [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't a Leviathan, [PAWN_pronoun] may not have been so lucky.
